triples.name: Abstract interpretation
triples.relevance: The paper introduces foundational principles of abstract interpretation as a theory for sound approximation of program semantics.

triples.name: Formal methods
triples.relevance: Formal methods provide the mathematical foundation and rigorous verification techniques that abstract interpretation builds upon.

triples.name: Static program analysis
triples.relevance: Static analysis is a primary application and implementation of abstract interpretation principles for verifying program properties without execution.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification encompasses abstract interpretation as a subroutine for proving program correctness properties.
